page.title: 05IVYTHORN FARM
page.content: Mr.Beaty thinks the topside is good for crops and Moorlands are good for grass.Flooding is a problem on the Black Moorland.They spend about Â£200-Â£300 on{drainage}ditches each year.They don't have many problems with flooding,sometimes they have crop disasters.They don't own any decoy pools.Their other animals are sheep,they don't rear beef cattle,but rear their own replacements They do not have any orchards,or horses.Mr.Beaty gets up at 5:30 a.m every morning.On his land he uses artificial fertilisers,he uses some herbicides and pesticides.He has owned his farm for thirty two years.
